text: Altererythrobacter endophyticus is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from the plant Halimione portulacoides. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter endophyticus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter endophyticus
